sentences.en: A catalyst is a substance which speeds up a chemical reaction.
sentences.cn: 催化剂是一种能加速化学反应的物质.

sentences.en: A pH test measures the acidity or alkalinity of a substance.
sentences.cn: pH值测试可检测物质的酸碱度。

sentences.en: basic rights are equivalent in substance to human rights.
sentences.cn: 基本权利大体上等同于人权。

sentences.en: Do not use this substance in an enclosed space.
sentences.cn: 切勿在不透气的地方使用此物质。

sentences.en: Her speech was memorable for its polemic rather than its substance.
sentences.cn: 她的演说之所以令人难忘，不是因其内容而是因其辩论方法。

sentences.en: Honey is a naturally acidic substance.
sentences.cn: 蜂蜜是天然的酸性物质。

sentences.en: It's questionable whether anything of substance has been achieved.
sentences.cn: 是否已经取得了任何实质性进展还是个问题。

sentences.en: Oxygen is one of the basic elements of substance.
sentences.cn: 氧是物质的基本元素之一.

sentences.en: Syria will attend only if the negotiations deal with issues of substance.
sentences.cn: 只有在谈判涉及重大问题时叙利亚才会参加。

sentences.en: The leaves were covered with a strange sticky substance.
sentences.cn: 树叶上覆着一层黏糊糊的怪东西。

sentences.en: The substance of his argument was that people on welfare should work.
sentences.cn: 他论点的主旨是享受社会福利的人应该去工作。

sentences.en: The substance of his discussions doesn'treally matter.
sentences.cn: 他讨论的要点实际上根本不重要。

sentences.en: The substance of their talk is condensed into a paragraph.
sentences.cn: 他们谈话的要旨被压缩成一段话.

sentences.en: The substance polymerizes to form a hard plastic.
sentences.cn: 这种物质聚合形成坚硬的塑料。

sentences.en: There is no substance in any of these allegations.
This is an attempt to confuse form and [ with ] substance.
sentences.cn: 这是企图把形式同实质混 淆.

sentences.en: This substance has now been cloned by molecular biologists.
sentences.cn: 该物质现在已被分子生物学家克隆。

sentences.en: to be arrested for possession of a controlled substance

words.tran_cn: 大量的；实质的；内容充实的
有实质的；大量的；真实的；独立存在的
实体；实质性；真实价值；内容
名词性实词；独立存在的实体

phrases.tran_cn: 活性物质；放射性物质；有效物质
P物质；[化]肽物质（即神经传递介质）

trans.tran_cn: 物质，材料，实质，内容，[神]灵，（织品的）质地
trans.tran_en: a particular type of solid, liquid, or gas
